gettoknow.headtitle: Get to know Dr. Enayat Modares more
gettoknow.headdescription: Hello, I am Inayat Modares - I came from poverty to the third university in the world, I worked with the United Nations, I was invited to the biggest world conferences, I changed the lives of thousands of people, tens of institutions andI founded a successful business, worked with the best national and international media, completed my medicine and master's degree in the most prestigious university in the world. At the moment, there are several online businesses and unique programs I lead the other. Now I came here to honestly and sincerely share the knowledge, experiences and skills I have learned along the way, which can save you from the trap of poverty and fulfill your dreams. deliver
gettoknow.transformtitle: So far, I have transformed the lives of thousands of people
gettoknow.transformdescription: From poverty to the third best university in the world, from cooperation with the United Nations to being invited to the biggest world conferences, from working with the best national and international media to leading several institutions. and successful business, from practicing medicine to completing a master's degree, from building dozens of leading online businesses to changing the lives of thousands of people around the world. Now I came to you with the latest knowledge and Today's money making skills will equip you to achieve your dreams
gettoknow.featuredline: AS FEATURED IN - Associates of Dr. Modares

getajob.headtitle: Get a job and side income with 31 sessions in (two months).

But where is the problem? Most people do not know where to start and how to start? At Modars Academy, we teach you these skills from (A to Z) in a practical way
